Name: It Came from Under the Ground
Secret Cache in the Eastern Regions
The Chief Is Dead. Long Live the Chief!
The Finest Assassins in the World of Magic
The Legendary Scourge
Description: The Bald Hilltop has awakened again - and this time the local are being assaulted not by common beast, but by legendary magical monsters! Wyverns, owlbears, and manticores, in a fit of fury, are ravaging the barony, led by a small number of particularly large and vicious beasts. Perhaps the invasion can be ended if their leaders are slain.

Name: The Rage of Sky and Wind
Tracking the Path of the Wild Hunt
